title: 'We're not the best and I don't care' - Man City go 12 points clear with win over Brentford
description: Manchester City move 12 points clear at the top of the Premier League after cruising to victory over Brentford at the Etihad Stadium.

title: Pub fine jar steers conversation away from Covid
description: A County Donegal pub introduces a fine jar to help steer conversations away from Covid-19.

title: PMQs: Fact-checking claims on fraud, Brexit and the economy
description: At Prime Minister's Questions, there were claims on fraud, Brexit and the economy.

title: Bosnia: Three decades on, bereaved families fear return to war
description: A rise in Serb nationalism is threatening the peace agreement that holds together Bosnia-Herzegovina.

title: Winter Olympics: Short-track drama, flag cam & singing on the slopes in day five best bits
description: Watch some of the best moments from day five of the Winter Olympics in Beijing, including short-track heartbreak, flag cam, big-air jumps and singing on the slopes.

title: Winter Olympics: 'No panic' over lack of Great Britain medals, says Dame Katherine Grainger
description: UK Sport chair Dame Katherine Grainger says she is "not panicking yet" after Great Britain fail to win a medal in the first five days of the 2022 Winter OIympics.

title: Covid isolation law could be scrapped in England this month
description: The rules are due to end in March - but that could be brought forward if "encouraging trends continue".

title: Heathrow arrest after woman says she was raped on flight
description: A man was arrested after the United Airlines flight from Newark Airport landed at Heathrow.

title: Ukraine tensions: Russia sees room for diplomacy
description: Speaking to the BBC, Russia's EU ambassador says conflict can still be avoided through diplomacy.

title: Capturing a semi-submersible loaded with cocaine
description: The Colombian navy seize a vessel carrying four tonnes of narcotics worth $150m (£110m).

title: Sadiq Khan demands Met chief Dame Cressida Dick's plan to win back trust within weeks
description: Sadiq Khan tells the BBC he will "take action" if he is not satisfied by Dame Cressida Dick's response.

title: Gillian Keegan: Minister sorry for not ending meeting after Covid result
description: Gillian Keegan says she briefly continued a meeting on Tuesday after finding out she was positive.

title: Mum's search for kidney donor that could save son's life amid legal row
description: A mum says her autistic son needs a transplant but medics argue it is not in his best interests.

title: Olympic redemption 16 years after blowing gold
description: Sixteen years after throwing away gold, Lindsey Jacobellis finally reaches the top of the Olympic podium.

title: Boris Johnson's leadership past point of no return, says big Tory donor
description: Financier John Armitage says he believes the UK's challenges require "serious, engaged" politicians.

title: Winter Olympics: Eve Muirhead targets elusive curling gold at fourth Games
description: Team GB women's curling captain Eve Muirhead on her battle back from hip surgery as she targets an elusive Olympic gold at her fourth Games.

title: Winter Olympics: Charlotte Bankes out of snowboard cross in quarter-finals
description: Great Britain's best medal hope Charlotte Bankes suffers a shock quarter-final exit in the women's snowboard cross at the Winter Olympics.

title: Half-term travel: UK families avoid Spain over jab rules
description: A rule barring unvaccinated over-12s means UK travellers are opting for Mexico and Turkey instead.

title: Brexit causing 'increased costs, paperwork, delays' say MPs
description: A cross-party committee of MPs warns things could get worse this year as new import controls come in.

title: Winter Olympics: Lindsey Jacobellis wins snowboard cross gold
description: Lindsey Jacobellis finally wins gold in the women's snowboard cross at the age of 36 - 16 years after blowing her chance of gold at Turin 2006.

title: Winter Olympics: Shaun White qualifies for men's halfpipe final
description: Triple Olympic champion Shaun White secures a place in the snowboard halfpipe final after a superb second run lands him fourth place while Japan's Ayumu Hirano qualifies in first.

title: Why Newcastle might finally sense a turning point in season
description: Newcastle fans celebrate a win that signals a change in fortunes brought about as much by Eddie Howe's methods as by their new signings.

title: Winter Olympics: Birk Ruud jumps with flag in hand after winning freestyle skiing big air
description: Birk Ruud celebrates a dominant gold medal in the freestyle skiing big air by performing his final jump while gripping the Norway flag.

title: Is this Scotland's most confusing street parking?
description: Drivers have criticised 'illogical' rules in the roads around Edinburgh's Royal Botanic Garden.

title: The Papers: 10m 'hidden' NHS patients and Adele scoops Brits
description: Plans to cut NHS waiting lists make many front pages, as does Adele's three wins at the Brit Awards.

title: Winter Olympics: Mikaela Shiffrin crashes out of slalom
description: Double Olympic champion Mikaela Shiffrin suffers a repeat of her giant slalom disaster as she crashes out of her first run in the women's slalom.

title: Brit Awards 2022: Anne-Marie's slip, Adele's return and more big moments
description: Ballads over bangers and on-stage slips - watch the must-see moments and performances from the Brits.

title: The unstoppable Adele and an inevitable victory
description: Adele's victory was inevitable given her millions of sales, but nobody really went home empty-handed.

title: Student and the dragon: £10k 'foundation' to help housing campaigner
description: Dragons' Den star Steven Bartlett was so moved by Kwajo Tweneboa's work he offered to mentor him.

title: 'Apprenticeships make you grow up faster than uni'
description: Joshua Mims, 19, explains why becoming an apprentice was the right decision for him.

title: Why Uganda is investing in oil despite pressures to go green
description: As people eye the benefits there are questions over the environmental cost and the timing.

title: Bosnia shivers as ghost of nationalism returns
description: Why Bosnian Serbs have a new strongman unafraid to stir the horrors of the past.

title: Wildlife Photographer of the Year People's Choice winner revealed
description: Cristiano Vendramin triumphed with an image of a frozen landscape, taken in memory of a lost friend.
